long_description: Innovative ice blanket remains flexible when frozen for a variety of cooling applications. Non-toxic Blue Ice(R) gel freezes provides consistent cooling power while remaining pliable for easier wrapping. Blanket can be trimmed to custom sizes for use in all types of coolers or for first aid usage. Reusable ice substitute doesn't create a meltdown mess.
short_description: Innovative ice blanket remains flexible when frozen for a variety of cooling applications.
